metadata.title: Chain of Custody Logging & Audit Trail

story.soThat: I can prove the integrity of my analysis in court

tests.ideas: - **Service Integration**: The `ChainOfCustodyService` should be a singleton or accessed via Hook throughout the app. - **Interceptor**: Consider a middleware approach if using Redux/Zustand middleware to auto-log state changes, otherwise manual calls `ChainOfCustodyService.log(...)` in handlers are fine.
